translated: Do not let all locusts, evil birds, beasts, violent storms, torrential rains, thunder, lightning, and evil poisonous dragons
Cause disasters and harm.

original: 令彼國中所有一切五穀苗稼華果子實悉皆豐熟。
analyzed: 令彼國中所有一切五穀苗稼華果子實悉皆豐熟。
translated: Cause all the five grains, seedlings, flowers, fruits, and seeds in that country to be abundant and ripe.
All dragon kings will protect them.

original: 又以真言加持淨沙一百八遍。
analyzed: 又以真言加持淨沙一百八遍。
translated: Also, empower pure sand with the mantra one hundred and eight times.

original: 田中園苑皆遍散撒一切苗稼華果樹上。
analyzed: 田中園苑皆遍散撒一切苗稼華果樹上。
translated: Scatter it all over the fields, gardens, and on all the seedlings, flowers, fruits, and trees.

original: 如是加持亦當不為一切蝗蟲二足多足種種蟲獸。
analyzed: 如是加持亦當不為一切蝗蟲二足多足種種蟲獸。
translated: In this way, empower them and they will not be harmed by all locusts, two-legged and many-legged insects, and various other animals.

original: 而作災暴食噉苗稼華果子實。
analyzed: 而作災暴食噉苗稼華果子實。
translated: They will not cause disasters or eat the seedlings, flowers, fruits, and seeds.
Another method is to do it in the fields and gardens.

original: 隨其大小如法塗治護摩方壇。
analyzed: 隨其大小如法塗治護摩方壇。
translated: According to their size, properly prepare the homa square altar.
Take acacia wood and sandalwood.
Cut them to the length of two fists, straight from the root to the tip.
Empower and burn them.

original: 當以大麥油麻粳米白芥子酥。🔽日別三時一誦真言。
analyzed: 當以大麥油麻粳米白芥子酥。 日別三時一誦真言。
translated: One should use barley, sesame, rice, white mustard seeds, and ghee.
Recite the mantra three times a day, each time empowering and burning one hundred and eight times.
Continue in this way until the seventh day is completed.

original: 則便除遣一切惡龍藥叉羅剎諸惡鬼神。
analyzed: 則便除遣一切惡龍藥叉羅剎諸惡鬼神。
translated: Then one will be able to dispel all evil dragons, yakshas, rakshasas, and evil ghosts and spirits.
Those who roam the world causing various calamities
will all flee in disarray.
And one will be able to eliminate all locusts, birds, and beasts
that eat people's seedlings, crops, flowers, fruits, and seeds.
They will all be eradicated.
Moreover, during the second and third months of spring
and the seventh and eighth months of autumn,

original: 高山頂上或於田中高勝望處。
analyzed: 高山頂上或於田中高勝望處。
translated: on the summit of a high mountain or in a field with an excellent view,
or on top of a high building,
for seven days and seven nights, one should be pure and clean according to the Dharma.
Anoint and decorate an eight-cubit maṇḍala.
Erect a flagpole on each of the four sides.
On top of the four flagpoles,

original: 繫懸一丈六尺素帛長旛。
analyzed: 繫懸一丈六尺素帛長旛。
translated: hang sixteen-foot long banners.
On the surface of the banners,

original: 各畫釋迦牟尼如來形像。
analyzed: 各畫釋迦牟尼如來形像。
translated: Each should paint an image of Shakyamuni Tathagata.

original: 佛右畫執金剛祕密主菩薩。
analyzed: 佛右畫執金剛祕密主菩薩。
translated: To the right of the Buddha, paint Vajra-Secret-Lord Bodhisattva.
To the left, paint Agastya Rishi.
With the banner hand pointing downward.
Write this mantra and sutra text.
Four vajra stakes made of sandalwood.
Three cubits long.
Incanted twenty-one times.
Nail them under the four banners.
Mark out the boundary.

original: 以時眾妙華香飲食果子。
analyzed: 以時眾妙華香飲食果子。
translated: With various wonderful flowers, incense, food, and fruit.
Arrange and offer them.

original: 寅時卯時辰時巳時未時申時酉時亥時。
analyzed: 寅時卯時辰時巳時未時申時酉時亥時。
translated: In the morning, noon, afternoon, evening, late afternoon, dusk, and late night.
Observe the seedlings in the fields in all directions.

original: 燒香啟請十方一切諸佛諸大菩薩一切天仙龍神八部。
analyzed: 燒香啟請十方一切諸佛諸大菩薩一切天仙龍神八部。
translated: Burn incense and invite all Buddhas, great Bodhisattvas, celestial immortals, dragons, spirits, and the eight groups from all directions.
Let them descend and bestow their blessings.
Recite this mantra one hundred and eight times.
Practice like this for seven days and nights.

original: 則得除滅一切惡風暴雨雷雹災障。
analyzed: 則得除滅一切惡風暴雨雷雹災障。
translated: Then you will be able to eliminate all bad winds, storms, thunder, hail, and calamities.

original: 復得除滅二足四足多足蝗蟲鳥獸。
analyzed: 復得除滅二足四足多足蝗蟲鳥獸。
translated: And can eliminate the harm of two-legged, four-legged, and many-legged locusts, birds, and beasts.
Which eat seedlings, crops, flowers, fruits, and seeds.
All will flee in all directions.

original: 復得除遣一切毒蛇虎狼等難一切災障悉皆除滅。
analyzed: 復得除遣一切毒蛇虎狼等難一切災障悉皆除滅。
translated: And can eliminate all difficulties caused by poisonous snakes, tigers, wolves, and so forth, and all calamities and hindrances will be completely eliminated.

original: 具壽慶喜復有根本心真言。
analyzed: 具壽慶喜復有根本心真言。
translated: The Venerable Ānanda also has a fundamental heart mantra.

original: 那謨勃陀耶一唵呬里弭里二戰抳尼例切弭哩理三戰抳戰抳蔓無繁切陀耶四莎嚩訶五佛告阿難此心真言。
analyzed: 那謨勃陀耶一唵呬里弭里二戰抳尼例切弭哩理三戰抳戰抳蔓無繁切陀耶四莎嚩訶五佛告阿難此心真言。
translated: Namo buddhāya one Om hri miri two Jhanini ni li three Mili li three Jhanini jhanini mantha ya four Svaha five The Buddha told Ananda, This heart mantra.

original: 若有人能信解受持高山頂上。
analyzed: 若有人能信解受持高山頂上。
translated: If there are people who can faithfully accept and uphold it on a mountain peak.
Using this mantra to empower a pomegranate staff.
One thousand and eighty times.

original: 右手執杖左手結龍坐印。
analyzed: 右手執杖左手結龍坐印。
translated: Hold the staff with the right hand and form the dragon sitting mudra with the left hand.
Following the ten directions.
Observe the heavens and earth.
The seedlings and crops in the fields.
With an angry voice, recite the mantra once.
Wield the staff once to strike and ward off.
Recite separately one thousand and eighty times.
Then it will cause all evil poisonous dragons and others
to have their body hairs stand on end, tremble in fear, and be uneasy.
The poisonous mind will cease and be extinguished.

original: 而便止除一切惡風惡雨毒氣雷雹霹靂。
analyzed: 而便止除一切惡風惡雨毒氣雷雹霹靂。
translated: And it will then stop all evil winds, evil rains, poisonous vapors, thunder, hail, and lightning.
Moreover, on the first and eighth days of the third month,
in a vast and high place with a commanding view,

original: 淨潔治地作四肘曼拏羅。
analyzed: 淨潔治地作四肘曼拏羅。
translated: cleanly prepare the ground and make a four-cubit maṇḍala.

original: 香水黃土瞿摩夷淨潔塗飾。
analyzed: 香水黃土瞿摩夷淨潔塗飾。
translated: Purely apply fragrant water, yellow earth, and cow bezoar.
Repeatedly apply white sandalwood incense paste.

original: 標列界道開廓四門紫檀木金剛橛八枚。
analyzed: 標列界道開廓四門紫檀木金剛橛八枚。
translated: Mark the boundaries and open up the four gates. Use purple sandalwood and eight vajra spikes.
Consecrate them twenty-one times at one time.
Nail them into the four corners and four gates.
As the boundary.
Five new arrows, consecrate them seven times.
Arrange them on the four sides. A sword-steel trident.
Stand it in the center of the altar.
Seven-colored thread, consecrate it seven times.
Surround it on the four sides as the outer boundary.

original: 四角中央置閼伽白栴檀香欝金香水。
analyzed: 四角中央置閼伽白栴檀香欝金香水。
translated: In the four corners and center, place argha water with white sandalwood, saffron, and fragrant water.
Insert branches, flowers, and leaves in the mouths of the jars.

original: 四門中央各置香爐五盤。
analyzed: 四門中央各置香爐五盤。
translated: In the center of each of the four gates, place five incense burners.
Various white foods.
Offer in the center of the four gates as prescribed.
And scatter various fragrant flowers.

original: 安悉香蘇合香沈水香白栴檀香薰陸香燒焯供養。
analyzed: 安悉香蘇合香沈水香白栴檀香薰陸香燒焯供養。
translated: Burn incense of aloe, olibanum, aquilaria, white sandalwood, and frankincense as offerings.

original: 稻穀華白芥子如法加持。
analyzed: 稻穀華白芥子如法加持。
translated: Empower paddy flowers and white mustard seeds as prescribed.
Offer and scatter on the altar.
Empower white mustard seed water seven times.
Scatter in the ten directions to form a boundary.
For seven days.

original: 六時時別觀視十方田野苗稼。
analyzed: 六時時別觀視十方田野苗稼。
translated: In the six periods, observe the seedlings in the fields in the ten directions in each period.

original: 奮聲誦心真言一千八十遍。
analyzed: 奮聲誦心真言一千八十遍。
translated: Recite the heart mantra with a loud voice one thousand and eighty times.
After seven days and nights.
Then, for the next eight months.
Everywhere in the ten directions, within one yojana.
There will be no yakshas, rakshasas, or ghosts and spirits.

original: 諸惡蟲類食噉苗稼華果子實者。
analyzed: 諸惡蟲類食噉苗稼華果子實者。
translated: All the evil insects and beasts that eat the seedlings, flowers, fruits, and seeds,
are all completely removed and scattered.

original: 持真言者當淨洗浴以香塗身。
analyzed: 持真言者當淨洗浴以香塗身。
translated: The mantra practitioner should cleanse and bathe, anoint the body with fragrance,
wear clean clothes, and practice according to the Dharma.
Kneel at the west gate.

original: 真言加持石榴杖一百八遍。🔽右手把杖左手結龍坐印。
analyzed: 真言加持石榴杖一百八遍。 右手把杖左手結龍坐印。
translated: Empower the pomegranate staff with the mantra one hundred and eight times.🔽Hold the staff with the right hand and form the dragon sitting mudra with the left hand.
Cross the left thumb in the palm.
Bend the middle finger and ring finger,

original: 屈壓大拇指上。🔽頭指直伸微屈。
analyzed: 屈壓大拇指上。 頭指直伸微屈。
translated: pressing down on the thumb.🔽The index finger is slightly bent and extended.
The little finger is extended straight.
The mantra practitioner circles the altar in the eight directions.
Stand and recite the mantra seven times each.
Then face the place where the clouds and rain arise.
Recite the mantra once to empower the hand staff.
Once it strikes the evil wind and rain,
it will be sent down and fall from the great mountain valley.
In this way, repel it one thousand and eighty times.
Those evil dragons will cease their poisonous thoughts.
The wind and rain will cease.

original: 若不止者又應准前倍復加法。
analyzed: 若不止者又應准前倍復加法。
translated: If they still do not cease, one should again follow the previous method and increase the rites.

original: 彼諸惡龍悉皆頭痛心痛身痛熱沙著身。
analyzed: 彼諸惡龍悉皆頭痛心痛身痛熱沙著身。
translated: Those evil dragons will all experience headaches, heart pain, body pain, and hot sand sticking to their bodies.
It will be as if their bodies and limbs are being cut by knives, and they will suffer.
These evil dragons will become greatly frightened.
Due to this method,
all the evil dragons in Jambudvīpa
will abide by the Dharma for eight months.
They will bring down sweet rain.

original: 若有熱類冷風暴雨雷雹霹靂。
analyzed: 若有熱類冷風暴雨雷雹霹靂。
translated: If there are hot things, cold winds, violent rains, thunder, hail, and lightning,
which arise repeatedly and cause disasters,

original: 紫檀木金剛橛一枚量長四把。
analyzed: 紫檀木金剛橛一枚量長四把。
translated: take a piece of sandalwood and a vajra stake, one foot long,
and empower it with the mantra one hundred and eight times.
Empower it once at the center of the altar,
and drive it in one hundred and eight times.
When the stake is completely driven in,

original: 惡風惡雨雷雹霹靂一時禁止。
analyzed: 惡風惡雨雷雹霹靂一時禁止。
translated: evil winds, evil rains, thunder, hail, and lightning will all be stopped at once.
If one wishes for rain, one should pull out the stake.
Also, take a new, clean sword,
Enchant twenty-one times with the mantra.

original: 右手執劍左手結龍坐印。
analyzed: 右手執劍左手結龍坐印。
translated: Hold the sword with the right hand and form the dragon sitting mudra with the left hand.

original: 當正立之觀視雲雨所起之處。
analyzed: 當正立之觀視雲雨所起之處。
translated: Stand upright and gaze at the place where the clouds and rain arise.
One sword mantra.

original: 一擬擊敵惡雲惡雨所起之處。
analyzed: 一擬擊敵惡雲惡雨所起之處。
translated: One is to strike at the place where the enemy's evil clouds and evil rain arise.
Then cause those evil poisonous dragons, etc.
To all see the flames penetrating the sky.

original: 是諸惡龍悉皆怖懼戰慄不安惡毒心息。
analyzed: 是諸惡龍悉皆怖懼戰慄不安惡毒心息。
translated: These evil dragons will all be frightened, trembling, uneasy, and their evil poisonous minds will cease.
Moreover, empower the saffron paste.

original: 劍兩面上畫大身孽嚕荼王。
analyzed: 劍兩面上畫大身孽嚕荼王。
translated: Draw the great-bodied Nāgarāja on both sides of the sword.
Then empower the sword one thousand and eighty times.

original: 右手執劍左手結龍坐印。
analyzed: 右手執劍左手結龍坐印。
translated: Hold the sword with the right hand and form the dragon sitting mudra with the left hand.
Face the eight directions and draw circles with the sword in each direction.
With an angry voice, recite the heart mantra.
One hundred and eight times.
In the palaces of those evil dragons,
They all see the great-bodied Nāgarāja.
Chasing after their bodies.
All will come out of the palace and run at once.

original: 更不非時起諸惡風雷雹暴雨。
analyzed: 更不非時起諸惡風雷雹暴雨。
translated: No more untimely evil winds, thunder, hail, or violent rains will arise.
In the south of the altar, make a homa hearth.

original: 加持躑躅華白芥子酥如法護摩一千八十遍。
analyzed: 加持躑躅華白芥子酥如法護摩一千八十遍。
translated: Consecrate oleander flowers, white mustard seeds, and ghee, and perform homa in accordance with the Dharma one thousand and eighty times.

original: 十二箇月不起非時惡風雷雹雨雪災障。
analyzed: 十二箇月不起非時惡風雷雹雨雪災障。
translated: For twelve months, untimely evil winds, thunder, hail, rain, snow, and calamities will not arise.
For those who follow the mantra, if rain is sent, it will rain.
Moreover, consecrate wax.
Mold it into a three-headed dragon king.
Resembling a celestial deity.
The body measures eight fingers.
Three snake dragon heads emerge from the top of the head.
Wear all kinds of clothes all over the body.
Pure gold adornments.

original: 復當如法塗飾三肘曼拏羅。
analyzed: 復當如法塗飾三肘曼拏羅。
translated: Moreover, in accordance with the Dharma, smear a three-cubit maṇḍala.

original: 淨瞿摩夷香水黃土淨潔泥飾。
analyzed: 淨瞿摩夷香水黃土淨潔泥飾。
translated: Pure cow dung perfume, yellow earth, and clean mud decorations.
White powder boundary paths only open the west gate.

original: 香華香水三白飲食敷置供養。
analyzed: 香華香水三白飲食敷置供養。
translated: Arrange incense, flowers, perfume, and three kinds of white food and drink as offerings.

original: 一㪷淨甕真言加持二十一遍。
analyzed: 一㪷淨甕真言加持二十一遍。
translated: Consecrate a clean jar twenty-one times with the mantra.
Place it on top of the altar in the center.
The root mantra and the mind mantra.
Empower the dragon king one thousand and eighty times.
Place it inside the dragon jar.
Seven times with a pure silk cloth four feet long.
Cover the mouth of the jar.
Form the dragon sitting mudra.
The two hands are joined at the wrists.
The ten fingers are spread out like a blooming lotus flower.
The two thumbs and two little fingers are pressed together.
The two index fingers are four inches apart.
One empowerment mudra.
One mudra on top of the mouth of the jar.
One hundred and eight times.

original: 稻穀華白芥子真言七遍。
analyzed: 稻穀華白芥子真言七遍。
translated: Seven times with unhusked rice and white mustard seeds.
Scatter it on the altar.
Burn various famous fragrances to invite and make offerings.
Hold a pomegranate staff in the right hand.
Recite the mind mantra once.
Call out the name of the dragon king Manasa once.
Empower the staff once.
Press it on the mouth of the jar one thousand and eighty times.
Then give this to the dragon king Sūryaprabha.
Grant the name of the dragon king Manasa.
The master of all poisonous dragons.
One should make a vow and say:

original: 攝禦禁止一切災風惡雲惡雨雷雹霹靂諸惡毒龍。
analyzed: 攝禦禁止一切災風惡雲惡雨雷雹霹靂諸惡毒龍。
translated: Subdue and restrain all calamities, bad winds, evil clouds, bad rain, thunder, hail, lightning, and all evil poisonous dragons.
At one time, the dragon king Manasa,
All came into the jar.
Then cut off and restrained the calamities, evil poisonous qi.
Thus it is cultivated.

original: 則得一切諸惡毒龍災風毒氣惡雲惡雨雷雹霹靂一時順伏。
analyzed: 則得一切諸惡毒龍災風毒氣惡雲惡雨雷雹霹靂一時順伏。
translated: Then one will obtain the obedience of all evil poisonous dragons, calamitous winds, poisonous qi, evil clouds, bad rain, thunder, hail, and lightning, all at once.
And they will all cease.
When this method is performed,
The mantra practitioner recites the heart mantra.

original: 一一遍後當稱摩那斯龍王名。
analyzed: 一一遍後當稱摩那斯龍王名。
translated: After each repetition, one should call out the name of the dragon king Manasa.

original: 滿三落叉此云三十萬則得摩那斯龍王額諸眷屬。
analyzed: 滿三落叉此云三十萬則得摩那斯龍王額諸眷屬。
translated: When one completes three lakh (one lakh = 100,000), one will obtain the forehead and all the retinue of the dragon king Manasa.
At one time, they will transform their forms into the body of a brahmin.
They will appear before the mantra practitioner and the Buddha.
At that time, one should offer argha water.

original: 供獻讚歎說諸佛名種種功德。
analyzed: 供獻讚歎說諸佛名種種功德。
translated: Praise and chant the names and various merits of the buddhas.
Having heard this, the dragon said with joy,
What do you need, sir?
He then told the dragon,

original: 贍部洲中多為諸惡毒氣惡風惡雲暴雨雷雹霹靂。
analyzed: 贍部洲中多為諸惡毒氣惡風惡雲暴雨雷雹霹靂。
translated: In Jambudvīpa, there are many evil poisonous vapors, evil winds, evil clouds, violent storms, hail, and thunderbolts.

original: 災壞一切苗稼華果子實滋味。
analyzed: 災壞一切苗稼華果子實滋味。
translated: These disasters destroy all seedlings, flowers, fruits, seeds, grains, and flavors.
This is why I need you.
The dragon said, As you wish.
When performing the ritual,
I will immediately follow you and do as you command.
I will bring down sweet rain.

original: 爾時復有大身孽嚕荼王。
analyzed: 爾時復有大身孽嚕荼王。
translated: At that time, there was also the king of the great-bodied Nāgarāja,
who rose from his seat, joined his palms in respect,
and stood respectfully with a focused mind.

original: 白言世尊我有金剛觜光焰睒電真言。
analyzed: 白言世尊我有金剛觜光焰睒電真言。
translated: He said to the World-Honored One, I have a mantra of the vajra-beaked light-flashing lightning,
with such a mantra's divine power and awesome ferocity,

original: 能燒能壞諸惡毒龍身心膚肉。
analyzed: 能燒能壞諸惡毒龍身心膚肉。
translated: it can burn and destroy the bodies and flesh of all evil poisonous dragons.

original: 亦能禁止一切災害惡風暴雨雷雹霹靂。
analyzed: 亦能禁止一切災害惡風暴雨雷雹霹靂。
translated: It can also prevent all disasters, evil winds, violent storms, hail, and thunderbolts.
